name: Dice Defender (Thy_Ghy)
description: This is a Round based game where you Push the Skeletons back with a roll of the dice. In this game you play as a dice defending your territory. Each roll of the dice is random and the bigger the number, the more damage you deal and the more you attack, But beware, the Skeletons evolve to. This Game is a Submission for the 2022 GMTK Game Jam, and includes a working Top 10 Leaderboard.
